FuncDef:
The set energy-saving pm enable command enables energy saving for PM modules.
The undo set energy-saving pm enable command disables energy saving for PM modules.
By default, energy saving is disabled for PM modules.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If energy saving is enabled for PM modules, the system shuts down unused PM modules to save energy. If energy saving is disabled, the system enables all the PM modules that have been shut down.
Precautions
If the standard energy-saving mode has been configured for the Router using the set energy-mode mode standard command, the set energy-saving pm enable command cannot be run.If the deep or optimal energy-saving mode has been configured using the set energy-mode mode { deep | optimal } command, energy saving cannot be disabled for PM modules. In this case, to disable energy saving for PM modules, run the undo set energy-mode mode command.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
